# emma Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "emma" {
  client_id     = "client_id"
  client_secret = "client_secret"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `client_id` (String)
- `client_secret` (String, Sensitive)

### Optional

- `host` (String)
